page.title: 01Weymouth-A family resort.
page.content: {WEYMOUTH}is one of the oldest established seaside resorts in Britain.It is said that bathing machines were first used in Weymouth.Certainly{King George III used one during his many visits to Weymouth from 1789 onwards.Weymouth has many Georgian buildings,dating from this time. The Weymouth area includes {PORTLAND}with its giant harbour, {RADIPOLE}with its lake and nature reserve and{LODMOOR}with the newly created Country Park and bird reserve. When visiting Weymouth you should spend time on the beach,walk around Weymouth Harbour,look into the local museum,visit the nature reserves and explore the surrounding countryside.
